title: Restore Power After Localized Outage
description: A transformer fails, causing a power outage in a residential neighborhood. An operator must use FLISR to restore power.

tasks.description: Receive an alert from a smart meter indicating a power outage at a specific address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the initial outage report.

tasks.description: The FLISR (Fault Location, Isolation, and Service Restoration) system automatically identifies the faulted grid section.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system pinpoints the outage to a specific transformer and the homes it serves.

tasks.description: Authorize the FLISR system to remotely reroute power from an adjacent circuit, restoring power to most affected homes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the automated action, and power is restored to 90% of customers.

tasks.description: Dispatch a repair crew to replace the failed transformer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a work order for the physical repair.
